author: A_Brickset_user
review: A great little M:Tron vehicle. Comes with the standard transparent neon green pieces that make the M:Tron line one of the best space themes ever. Pretty expensive on its on, you can easily make this set from spare parts. A great support vehicle.

author: Aaronlego
title: Nice little vehicle
review: This set is pretty cool.The radar and antenae are nice.The minifig is a bit exposed.They could put like a little gun holder to holder a laser gun that he could hold.Pretty good set.I give it a 10 because it is small nut adequate.

author: zinkk757
title: 4/5 could be cooler
review: This set is small and part of a bonus pack so it was suposed to be simple.  The vehicle is really cool with articulation and some satelite equiptment in the back.  The only complaint i have with this set is that the 2 x 2 45 degree slope on the front should have the m-tron logo.

author: hustla187
title: Uplink 4x4
review: This is a pretty wicked vehicle right here because the way it turns is very cool and makes this set unique. The wheels and tire are rugged which makes this set better. This is a beautiful set and should be picked up online.

author: AETerry
title: M-Tron Set
review:
This is part of a larger Value Pack set that offers up a variety of different smaller sets from different themes for Legoland.

 

This was alright in my book, a M-Tron Minifigure, flat computer piece and some wheels and a hinged piece that's not often seen in Lego when building vehicles. Fairly decent for it's size and to give a taste of the Larger M-Tron them and coloring.
